SEARCH
Package is.hi.hbv501g.hbv1.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
is.hi.hbv501g.hbv1.controllers.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="api/v1/user") public class UserController extends Object
API for UserDTO objects. Append /user to the base URL to access these endpoints.
Since:
2023-09-27
Version:
3.0
Author:
Andri Fannar Kristjánsson, afk6@hi.is. Converted to a REST API 2024-02-15., Ástríður Haraldsdóttir Passauer, ahp9@hi.is., Sigurður Örn Gunnarsson, sog6@hi.is., Friðrik Þór Ólafsson, fto2@hi.is.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserController

      @Autowired public UserController(is.hi.hbv501g.hbv1.services.UserService userService)
      Construct a new UserController.
      Parameters:
      userService - UserService linked to controller.

  • Method Details

    • signUp

      @RequestMapping(value="/signUp", method=POST) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<UserDTO>> signUp(@RequestBody SignUpDTO signUpDTO)
      Sign up a new User. Append /signUp to the base URL + Controller URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      signUpDTO - SignUpDTO object to create User from.
      Returns:
      ResponseWrapper containing User signed up, or in case of errors, containing an ErrorResponse.

    • loginPOST

      @RequestMapping(value="/login", method=POST) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<UserDTO>> loginPOST(@RequestBody LoginDTO loginDTO)
      Logs in a User with credentials. If successful, returns the User. Append /login to the base URL + Controller URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      loginDTO - LogInDTO object that contains a User's login info.
      Returns:
      A ResponseWrapper containing the User that credentials belonged to, or in case of errors, containing an ErrorResponse.

    • deleteUser

      @RequestMapping(value="/delete/{userID}", method=DELETE) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> deleteUser(@PathVariable("userID") Long userID)
      Delete User from API. Append /delete/{userID} to the base URL + Controller URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      userID - ID of User to delete.
      Returns:
      HTTP Status 200.

    • getUser

      @RequestMapping(value="view/{userID}", method=GET, produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<UserDTO>> getUser(@PathVariable("userID") Long userID)
      Get User from API. Append /view/{userID} to the base URL + Controller URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      userID - ID of User to get.
      Returns:
      UserDTO of requested user if successful. HTTP Status 404 if User is not found.

    • updateUser

      @RequestMapping(value="/update/{requestingUserID}", method=PUT) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<UserDTO>> updateUser(@PathVariable("requestingUserID") Long requestingUserID, @RequestBody UserDTO updatedUser)
      Update stored User. Append /update/{requestingUserID} to the base URL + Controller URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      requestingUserID - ID of User making the update (for verification).
      updatedUser - UserDTO with updated info for the User being updated.

    • getAllUsers

      @RequestMapping(value="/getAll", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<List<UserDTO>>> getAllUsers()
      Gets a list of all Users saved to the API. Append /getAll to the base URL + Controller URL to access this endpoint.
      Returns:
      List of all saved Users.

    • getUsersByRole

      @RequestMapping(value="/getByRole", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<List<UserDTO>>> getUsersByRole(@RequestParam UserRole userRole, @RequestParam boolean elevated)
      Gets a list of all Users saved in the API with a specified UserRole. Also fetches Users with higher roles if specified. Append /getByRole to the base URL + Controller URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      userRole - Get Users with specified UserRole.
      elevated - Get Users with higher role if true. If false, only fetches Users with specified UserRole.
      Returns:
      List of all saved Users with specified UserRole.
